author: .fjl
content:
A question for people who are interfacing with EIP-7002 or EIP-7251 on the contract level: I have submitted a change to the contracts for review today. 

- https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9024
- https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9025

I am proposing to change the get operation in the contracts to return the fee instead of the count of excess requests. This is to simplify interaction with the contracts. Please let me know if this change interferes with any use case you might have or if you consider it good. ğŸ™
